pli-tv-pvr2.7:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.1: (1) When it comes to the offenses for a lustful nun consenting to a lustful man making physical contact with her, through how many of the seven ways of settling legal issues are they settled?
pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.2: … They are stopped by three decidings:
pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.3: it may be by a verdict in the presence of and by the carrying out on (her) acknowledgement; it may be by a verdict in the presence of and by a covering over (as) with grass …
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.1: … the offences of partaking of curds, having had them asked for
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.3: … and by a covering over (as) with grass.
pli-tv-pvr2.7:3.1: Concluded is the Seventh Chapter: on Deciding
